titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons, assembled in Parliament, inhibiting the importation of currans.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: £100,000 of ready money is being annually spent on currans, a mere superfluity, .. Their importation is forbidden after 30 September. .. -- Steele.
Order to print dated and signed: Veneris 26 August. 1642. Hen. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
